name: TransportationInsecurityScreeningAssessmentsQuestions
title: Transportation Insecurity Screening Assessments Questions
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents screening assessment questions for Transportation Insecurity as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values may be used to represent screening assessment questions in observations, questionnaires, and questionnaire responses for this SDOH domain (e.g., for the SDOHCC Observation Screening Response profile in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for SDOH screening assessment questions as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes the questions not selected by the Gravity Project from SDOH screening assessments.)

concept.display: Has lack of transportation kept you from medical appointments, meetings, work, or from getting things needed for daily living [CMS Assessment]
Has lack of transportation kept you from medical appointments, meetings, work, or from getting things needed for daily living
Do you have trouble finding or paying for transportation [WellRx]
Went without health care due to lack of transportation in last 12 months
Delayed medical care due to distance or lack of transportation

contains.display: Has lack of transportation kept you from medical appointments, meetings, work, or from getting things needed for daily living during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Has lack of transportation kept you from medical appointments, meetings, work, or from getting things needed for daily living
Do you have trouble finding or paying for transportation [WellRx]

Delayed medical care due to distance or lack of transportation
